name: Andreas STIHL AG & Co. KG
goal:
Leading european manufacturer of handheld and ground supported forest and garden tools like chainsaws, hedge trimmers and brush cutters.

Main interests are the active development of environmental and safety regulations for products, driven with internal combustion as well as electric engines.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Environment, External Relations, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: Review of NRMM Directive, Machinery Directive, Outdoor Noise Directive, RoHS Directive, EMC Directive, Low Voltage Directive, Radio Equipment Directive, Ecodesign Directive, Battery Directive
